title: Another "NO URF" thread
body:
No urf, and we get some skins you have to pay for, in return.
enuf said, rito plz.

replies.body: Urf is on rotating mode. Every game mode will make an appearance at least once a year. You still get April fools skins but urf comes later on
It will come twice this year, ... for 6 days total{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

thats horrible. ya see?
Expensive skins, and no urf. Lose lose.. Maybe if the skins were like 50rp at least.
